XLINKHS ART UPDATE

You are going to update ART (Atheros Radio Test) on the device.
Please, choose file from your local hard drive and click Update ART button.

Please, go uboot to update U-Boot or firmware to update firmware.
WARNINGS
  • do not power off the device during update
  • if everything goes well, the device will restart
  • be sure that you choose proper ART image for your device
You can find more information about this product on XAG
